content:
Inspectors for money checked in the state database information about the presence or absence for men of conscript age prohibitions on the crossing of the border.

About thisShe reported March 13Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region.

The border guards also determined whether their "customers" were wanted by representatives of the shopping center.

The defendants worked in various structural units and were not familiar, but acted according to a similar scheme. They communicated through messengers and acted with mediators. This service cost $ 150.

Currently, indictments against officials are sent to court, and they are transferred to a structural unit that performs tasks in the east of the country.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedAbout two evil people who wanted to get to Hungary and bought an invisible boat on the border.
title: In the Lviv region, two border guards who leaked information to evaders will be tried
description: This was reported on March 13 by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region. Also border guards ...
author: Army Inform
